body: Sylph spellcasters sometimes find that their elemental heritage makes creatures of air more willing to serve them. Summon monster and summon nature's ally spells that the sylph casts last 2 rounds longer than normal when used to summon creatures with the air subtype. This racial trait replaces air affinity.
name: Air Insight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Sylphs/Alternate Racial Traits/Air Insight
